title: The Two-One-Two Recipe
full_text:
The Two-One-Two Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
1 min
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
reposado
tequila
(Partida recommended)
1
ounce
aperol
2
ounces
grapefruit juice
Ice
Directions
Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well until chilled, about 10 seconds. Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
Special equipment
cocktail shaker, strainer
Tequila
